author: GothamResearch
content:
AAC Technologies LTD (Ticker = 2018): Is there a smoking gun? See for yourself - Part II Preview
 https://t.co/h2HOxyrl50

author: GothamResearch
content: AAC Technologies describes Shuyang Lisheng as an AAC subsidiary per this Chinese Court Document: https://t.co/wwd6biBhKi

author: GothamResearch
content: If AAC itself describes Shuyang Lisheng as a subsidiary, how is Shuyang Lisheng not an undisclosed related party, as claimed?

author: GothamResearch
content: So was AAC falsely describing Shuyang Lisheng as a subsidiary to the court, or is AAC & others providing false/misleading information now?
